about_the_game:
Well-designed Strategic Construction

In the world of Hammer Knight, every gear and tower is an essential part of the path to victory. Build defensive structures from turrets to flame cannon, using your wits and strategy to fend off the machine legion's attacks. Each successful defense is a supreme test of your architectural strategy.

Randomly Enhanced Upgrade Path

Defeat enemies, collect the building materials and experience points they leave behind, and unlock a series of randomly appearing upgrade options. This not only grants you and your buildings more powerful abilities—from increased mobility to an overall boost in attack power—but also adds infinite possibilities to your game strategy.

Confrontations With Legendary Enemies

When boss monsters appear in the game, be prepared for the challenge and gain legendary enhancements. These special abilities can completely change your combat style, providing additional resources and support to give you an edge in the challenge.

Strategic Planning and Challenges

Hammer Knight is a dual test of intelligence and speed. The game requires players to react quickly and plan tactically to deal with increasingly powerful enemy threats. Each playthrough brings new challenges through different strategies, and every strategic adjustment could be the key to victory.
